lead_paragraph: BP has asked Kuwait's sovereign wealth fund to raise its share in the company to 3 percent, Reuters said, citing a report in the al-Anba newspaper Monday.
snippet: BP has asked Kuwait's sovereign wealth fund to raise its share in the company to three percent, the al-Anba newspaper reported on Monday.

headline.main: BP Said to Ask Kuwait Fund to Raise Stake

abstract: BP has asked Kuwait's sovereign wealth fund to raise its share in the company to three percent, the al-Anba newspaper reported on Monday.
